summary: An adventurous young koala embarks on a journey across the wild and dangerous Australian outback in the hope of finding his missing father, but he soon discovers that there is more to being a hero than meets the eye.
cast: Billy Birmingham|Toni Collette|Charlotte Rose Hamlyn|Barry Humphries|Ryan Kwanten|Deborah Mailman|Robin McLeavy|Barry Otto|Tin Pang|Richard Roxburgh|Cam Ralph|Rufus Sewell|David Wenham|Tracy Lenon|Steve Cooper|Fin Edquist|Gabrielle Joosten|Ben Wanders|Elif Acehan|Stephanie Mountzouris|Byron Schepen
keywords: missing father|australian outback|koala|australian fantasy|based on tv series
title: Blinky Bill: El Koala
